alert.note: Alert for Greenwood; Newberry; Saluda (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 19 at 9:17AM EDT until April 21 at 10:33AM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Columbia SC has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Carolina... Congaree River At Congaree National Park-Gadsden affecting Calhoun and Richland Counties. Congaree River At Carolina Eastman affecting Richland, Calhoun and Lexington Counties. Saluda River At Chappells affecting Newberry, Saluda and Greenwood Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saluda River At Chappells. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Lowlands around and downstream from Chappells become flooded. Cattle grazing river bottomland should be moved to higher ground. At 16.0 feet, Extensive farmland and river bottomland around and downstream from Chappells become flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM EDT Tuesday the stage was 9.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 15.5 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and take action if necessary. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening by 10 PM EDT.
